name: whatsapp-recent-chats2
title: Whatsapp Recent Chats2
description: Search and open recent WhatsApp chats from your local WhatsApp database
author: mendel_g

commands.name: recent-chats
commands.title: Recent Whatsapp Chats
commands.subtitle: Search and open recent WhatsApp chats from your local WhatsApp database
commands.description: Search and open recent WhatsApp chats from your local WhatsApp database

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
